description:
Looks good, promising start, especially if we consider that the developer self considers the application an alpha/beta state software yet. 

It uses hardware resources much higher yet than it should, no cache for podcasts (so, always reloads everything), but they know that and as the dev said, they work on features and refinements.

Also, it doesn't load, yet, album arts for local music.

Once it's done, it will be a killer media application on Linux.

This app is absolutely what I needed, a way to listen to my mp3 music files offline. It has everything to provide a good listening experience, a queue, playlists, favourites, etc... 
It just has a problem of not displaying the album covers. Even though my tracks have an album cover, when I download a new track, it does not display the album cover, just the default CD image.

Other than that, Its a daily use app for me and works great! Extra thanks to the developers ;)
summary: Amazing app, but has a small problem

description:
Main plus of the app is it make local music and podcast available in a fast & beautiful interface. It loads my music library super quickly.

One problem I have is it doesn't follow the fontconfig or any way to configure the fonts. I have change the Arabic font in my system as the default one was unreadable. But Musicpad defaults to that Arabic font. Please fix this accessibility issue.
Looks and works great. Well done to the dev.
One of the best software, great for me, thankyou guys.
summary: One of the best software, great for me, thankyou guys

description: Does exactly what I expected. Clear and clean interface, finds all podcasts and radio stations I was interested in

i just downloaded 5 apps here in Plasma Discover store, for subscribing to, but more importantly, for discovering podcasts, like the great podcast addict on my phone. never have i found anything even remotely close for a linux desktop, until discovering this gem. at first it launches with no icon, just a generic 'X' icon, it's a snap btw, but when it loaded, and i selected podcasts, it loads just 20 by default, and it auto detects your country, which is cool, but i switched it to US for more variety of stuff in my language. the music player seems pretty solid too, and didn't even explore the radio section, but, overall, this gets 5 stars because of its clean and polished modern interface, and easy to understand, and seems to work just fine. thank you devs, this is a great app. it looks like GTK but looks fine on my Qt Plasma desktop.
summary: just what i've been looking for for desktop podcasts discovery!

description: Can't import my podcast list, and the one available doesn't have several of mine listed?
worked great love the graphics too
esta buena, realmente el performance y optimización fue inesperado apenas la abrí, una aplicación en GTK es mucho mas lenta
summary: Mucho mejor que una aplicación GTK

description: отличное решение ,как замена тунеру на ядре 44, музыка всех стран и на все вкусы.
